mapper.select: select igc.web_id "webId", igc.group_id "groupId", igc.web_url "webUrl", igc.web_name "webName", igc.web_icon "webIcon", igc.if_des "ifDes" FROM index_group_child igc LEFT JOIN index_web_group iwg on igc.group_id = iwg.GROUP_ID LEFT JOIN sys_user su on su.user_id = iwg.user_id WHERE su.username = #{username};
